title: Please help me ID a font used in a print ad for Citroen!
author: ozi

comments.content: I think Citroën uses a custom font.

True story. Found an article on that:  
 [http://www.designworkplan.com/typography-fonts/citroen-rebrand.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015031917/http:/www.designworkplan.com/typography-fonts/citroen-rebrand.htm "http://www.designworkplan.com/typography-fonts/citroen-rebrand.htm")
The custom font is awesome. I love the capital R and N.
